availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John B. Buckman (Union County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Julia A. Buckman. Father of Susan M. Buckman, William Buckman, Ellen Buckman, Ignatius Buckman, Julia Buckman, Dunbar Buckman, and Emma Buckman. Farmer in Union County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p.18
Find A Grave, "John Baptist Buckman (1817-April 4, 1884)," Memorial #40746001, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/40746001 (accessed May 9, 2018).
